Description: In this session the three speakers, Dr. Lorelei Muccie, Dr. Karen Vousden and Dr. Lewis Cantley will discuss the influence of diets and lifestyle on both the risks of getting cancers and on the efficacy of therapies for treating cancers.  The talks will address data from preclinical studies in animal models as well as human clinical trials.  The effect of restricting various nutrients, such as amino acids, rapid release carbohydrates or fatty acids in the diet on the incidents of cancers or the response of cancers to targeted therapies will be discussed.
Location: La Nouvelle Orleans A-B, Convention Center
SearchResultBody: ED004. Diet and Lifestyle Risks for Cancer

Title: Diet and Lifestyle Risks for Cancer
